name: Gilles de Rais [Knight]
ability: Moderately increases DMG taken; sharply increases crit rate.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a commander considered to be a hero and savior of France. He earned himself a pretty bad reputation while alive through a number of unsavory incidents. But he actually had a period where he behaved as a deeply loyal knight, even if that's not the story history books tell. He knows it's too late to change the past, but he feels like he can possibly start making up for his sins by putting on his old armor and devoting himself to the cause of justice.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 30/10/16 - 31/12/16
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)

main: "Oh, I doubt I'll be going to heaven."
skill: "I'll do anything and everything in my power!"
summon: "If my powers can be of use..."
limit_break: "If this is what is asked of me, then so be it."
